intro.part1: Hi, may name is Curie, a light weight Artificial Intelligence

classification.title: Classification
classification.intro: Classification is the process of predicting the class of given data points. Classes are sometimes called as targets/ labels or categories. Classification predictive modeling is the task of approximating a mapping function (f) from input variables (X) to discrete output variables (y).
classification.hints: Hints: Keep the class or label (aka: Y_train) in the last column. Those rows with empty class or label will be regarded as instances to be classified.

clustering.hints: Hints: All columns will be used as attributes for clustering
